sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01
UPPER(EaiBzwkDstcd) LIKE '%' || #searchEaiBzwkDstcd# || '%'

SELECT C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD BIZCODE , C01.BZWKDSTICNAME BIZNAME , C01.BZWKDSTICDESC BIZDESC , decode(R06.EAIBZWKDSTCD,null,'false','true') CHK FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 C01 LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 R06 ON ( C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD = R06.EAIBZWKDSTCD AND R06.USERID = #userId# ) WHERE 1=1
UPPER(C01.EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#searchBzwkName[]#) || '%' OR UPPER(C01.BZWKDSTICNAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#searchBzwkName[]#) || '%'
order by 1
